descriptionHtml:
This is a retexture of the hide shield in skyrim. I made it for my character and thought; why not share it! If I can make one other person happy with it, it\'s worth it :)

This is my first mod ever. I made it to match the Triss Armor Retextured mod, which replaces the Dark Brotherhood armor. To be enchanted and improved to your liking.

Please leave a comment (and maybe, if you like it, an endorsment :) And as said, I am a total noob at modding so please don\'t go \"Oh you should have made it HQ and do this and that\" cause frankly, that\'s all beyond my skill xD

Paste in skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\hide

Have fun!

To do:
-Make it stand-alone
-Increase value and armor rating
-requests? Post in comments section
author: Snotterkop
